name: GREAT TASTE GOLD AWARDS 2013
description:
We are proud to announce that our Chilli Chai Red and Olay! Olay! Olay! Lemongrass Zest teas won GOLD this year at the 2013 Great Taste Awards. Wahooooo!

We only entered a few blends into this, as it was our first time, so are very happy to know that these two healthy caffeine free blends came home with a little gold star attached to them. 

Who knows? We may have more winning blends lurking in our collection - we just need to enter them into the judging next year to see how well they fair....

But for now enjoy these super tasty, healthy herbal blends and tell all your friends & family "We won" Yay!

name: Olay! Olay! Olay! Lemongrass Zest
description:
Zingy sweet-mint infusion

Mint and lemon go so well together. The addition of ginger, peppercorns and liquorice offer another depth of flavour to this unusual blend of tea, whilst the soothing aroma of the peppermint lingers as you sit back, relax and sip.  This particular blend is new and refreshing - totally caffeine free –which means you can drink it anytime you like, hot or iced.  A tasty brew for all occasions. Delicious!

Ingredients: Lemongrass, lemon peel, peppermint, liquorice root, ginger pieces, black peppercorns


*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Wimbledon Strawberries & Cream
description:
Wimbledon strawberries & Cream
Love – Deuce!

Love deuce indeed!  How can you resist such a winning combination?  This tea sums up what the summer is  all about;  the smell of freshly cut grass; a warm breeze floating in the air; the gentle bop, bop, thwop of a tennis ball, and the muted  silence of a crowd as an umpire announces “quite please”.  Happiness is a cup of this!  Bring on those halcyon days of summer we say.  

Ingredients: Black congou, strawberry pieces, vanilla, marigold flower, hibiscus, rosehip, apple & kiwi

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Champagne Breakfast
description:
Could there be a better way to start your day?

Who needs champagne when you have this carefully selected blend of Darjeeling and Assam pekoe leaves?  It’s the kind of tea that puts you in a great mood, and makes you want to get out of bed in the morning. The elegant, aromatic, woodsy leaves of the Darjeeling steep into a satisfyingly liquor and blends perfectly with the rich naturally sweet, red-malt body of the Assam. First-class with or without milk and perfect any time of day. Sublime!

Ingredients: Organic Darjeeling, Assam BOP blend 

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Hebridean Charm Heather Mint
description:
A bright tea full of the wild outdoors

If you want a mouth tingling, invigorating tea full of energy and optimism, then this is the one for you.  Mixed with high quality black congou is our finest pure cut peppermint, and the taste of sweet untamed heather flowers, bilberries and grassy nettles.  Whatever the time of year, bring a breath of fresh air into your day with this new and enthralling blend.

Ingredients:  Black tea, cut peppermint, heather flowers, nettle leaves, bilberries

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Cherry Blossom
description:
Cherry blossom (Limited edition)
As ethereal as the blossoms themselves

It only happens once a year and how glorious it is when it does?  We collect fresh cherry blossoms, whilst in bloom, and carefully dry them to add to our Japanese green tea with cherry, apple and hibiscus pieces. The exquisite combination of subtle, mellow sencha blended with the peppery fruit flavours of the cherry petals is one not to be missed. We wish it could last all year long, but alas, once this stock is gone, it’s gone. Until next year that is!

Ingredients: Japanese Sencha, apple & cherry pieces, hibiscus, rosehip, orange peel, cherry blossom, rose petal

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Silk Road
description:
A ‘jewel of a tea’ full of sweet intoxicating aromas

An exotic cache for the eyes and senses to behold. Blended with the finest congou is a striking mix of spices – orange peel, hibiscus, cloves, almonds, cornflower petals (which add a lovely touch of lapis lazuli blue to the blend) and golden sunflowers. All conjure up a wonderful Arabian sense of mystery and relaxation under an oriental sky.  This is a creamy tasting tea served hot with milk in the winter months or iced for a luxurious summer treat. 

Allergens: Almond and walnut

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Kew Gardens
description:
Nicole Kidman’s Favourite: A ‘lovely jubbly’ blend

This really is a handsome tea! Gorgeous summer blossoms of marigold, rose petal, thistle and mallow flower all blend together brilliantly to make this tea a marvellous sensation you will adore! It evokes the long days of summer – lazy sunny afternoons, gentle showers, picnics on lawns and croquet.  This is an unashamedly joyful tea, as deliciously refreshing as it is stunning to view and sip.

Ingredients: Black congou tea, marigold petal, rose petal, red thistle flower, blue cornflower, mallow flower

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Egyptian Peppermint
description:
A fine minty persuasion 
2013 GREAT TASTE GOLD * (Reginald Ames)

Pure cut Egyptian peppermint is a highly aromatic leaf. The very smell of it is said to “re-animate the spirit and help cleanse the soul,” according to Pliny the Elder.  It can be used as an instant pick-me-up, or as a soothing after-dinner aid to digestion and stress release.  It is deliciously light and remarkably fresh.  Freshness being the key word here; once you’ve tasted our lovely peppermint version, you’ll never want to go back to stale tea bag varieties again!

Ingredients: Egyptian cut peppermint

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Lychee Wolfberry
description:
Silky smooth and simply irresistible

The delicate charm of ripened lychee fruit is an excellent companion to the pungent, deep nature of China’s black congou tea. Like our rose blend, the leaves are left to infuse for months at a time amongst layers of lychee peel, which impart their Moorish scent into the tea.  To balance out the soft sweet aroma we have added seasoned red peppercorns and tart Chinese wolfberries (otherwise known as goji berries) giving a perfectly balanced tone of flavour across the tongue.  This blend is luscious any time of year and will make a delectable iced tea. 

Ingredients: Black tea infused with lychee peel, wolfberries, red peppercorns, rose petal

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Aisha Fabienne's Blend
description:
Smart, attractive, elegant

This is a unique tea developed and commissioned with one of our Scottish customers for their daughter’s 21st birthday.  It’s the 21st tea to go into our collection, so a fitting tribute to such a talented young lady.  And this truly is a special blend, combining pretty heather flowers with soft French lavender; and rooibos with a stylish cherry/berry hibiscus base that adds a fine background note to the red-mint infusion.  A remarkable tea for all to enjoy. 

Ingredients: Rooibos, peppermint, hibiscus, cherry & red berry, black tea, orange peel, heather flower, lavender, rose

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Imperial Afternoon
description:
A “captivating tea”– complex and smooth

"Man tea for man time!"  
An intoxicating blend of Chinese and Indian teas, with the smokey aroma of Lapsang Souchong infused with jasmine and oil of bergamot.  This is a well-structured, sophisticated tea - one to indulge in and savour.  A luxury you can afford to treat yourself to every day. 

Ingredients: Ceylon, Keemun, Darjeeling, Lapsang Souchong, jasmine, rose, oil of bergamot 

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Chilli Chai Red
description:
A spicy adventure

If you’re into spice-based chais, then this one is for you. It has a smooth nutty base of caffeine free Rooibos, and a satisfying kick of ginger, chilli flakes and piquant red peppercorns. Plus there’s a lovely contrast of orange blossom and safflower petals for an attractive look. Try it straight up or infused in hot milk with honey for a truly fabulous chai latte. It’s the kind of thing you can get addicted to.

Ingredients: Rooibos, cinnamon, orange blossom, blackberry leaves, cardamom seeds, ginger, clove buds, safflower, red peppercorns, chilli flakes


*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: China Rose Congou
description:
‘Infused with the scent of a thousand rose petals’

Delicate and ethereal, Rose Congou is the ‘Emperor of Teas’.  The fine black tea is layered with rose petals and left to infuse in carefully controlled conditions to absorb the scent of the flowers, which is most intense at night. The brewed tea yields a liquor that is subtle and tantalisingly delicate, with the gorgeous scent of rose petals. This tea has a good balance of strength and flavour - ideal for drinking in the mid afternoon.

Ingredients: Black congou, rose petals

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Earl Grey Royal Blue
description:
A classic blend with stunning ‘kerb appeal’
2013 GREAT TASTE GOLD 2* (Reginald Ames)

This blend uses fine black tea from China's Anhui Province, infused with pure natural bergamot oil.  The addition of stunning blue cornflower petals makes this tea extra special and visually beautiful too. 
It was said that Lord Grey popularised this particular drink by serving it to his guests when he was Britain’s Prime Minister in the late 1830s. It has remained a British classic ever since.   

Ingredients: Black tea, oil of bergamot, blue cornflower petals

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Red Mint: Mury's Tea
description:
Tranquil and suave

We made this tea for one of our customers who asked for a blend of caffeine free rooibos and peppermint, which we happily did, and named Mury’s Tea in her honour.  We hope you enjoy this delightfully refreshing blend of red and mint leaves, which combines the soft nutty notes of rooibos with the cool fresh aroma of peppermint.  Wonderfully relaxing and deliciously chic.

Ingredients: Organic Rooibos, Egyptian cut peppermint

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Vanilla Mint Lapel
description:
Minty Heaven

What a treat of a tea this is. A velvet mint pleasure!  Relaxing and smooth, this is a tea break worth waiting for, and one not to be rushed. Cool and creamy, you’ll never want it to end.  Best taken without milk, and perfect any time of day when you long for a quiet moment to relax.  Sheer bliss!

Ingredients: Black congou, cut peppermint leaves, vanilla pieces

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Huangshan Ya: Yellow Mountain Jasmine
description:
Aromatic and elegant, jasmine green tea

Huang Shan means Yellow Mountain and is the name of the peaks where this green tea is grown, in Anhui province, China. The tea trees here are moistened by the clouds and the fog and since their position protects them from extreme weather, they give rise to great flavoured tea.  Huangshan Ya is infused with the scent of jasmine flowers and has a lovely dry, mellow taste, with a heady, exotic jasmine fragrance.

Ingredients: Green tea from Anhui Province infused with jasmine flower

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Black Dragon High Mountain Oolong
description:
Chestnut freshness with a smooth aroma

The name oolong, (Chinese: 烏龍茶) translates into English as “Black Dragon tea”, due to the dark, curly nature of the dried leaves. It’s traditionally grown on the high mountain slopes of Taiwan, where the leaves are picked, oxidised and sun baked before being ‘wrap-curled’. The taste of oolong ranges widely depending on the length of oxidation and climate it is grown in.  This superb variety has a rich caramel scent which produces a deep golden liquor.  The aroma is refined and soft with a sweet chestnut perfume resulting in a smooth, mellow taste. 

Ingredients: Organic Oolong

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: The Dancers (Art Print)
description:
Limited Edition Art Print signed by the artist
All with conservation mount board and available framed ready to hang. Two sizes available with only 50 prints produced for each design. 
Very exclusive offer (NO GALLERY COMMISSION ADDED as straight from the artist)

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

Limited Edition Art Print signed by the artist
All with conservation mount board and available framed ready to hang. Two sizes available with only 50 prints produced for each design. 
Very exclusive offer (NO GALLERY COMMISSION ADDED as straight from the artist)

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

name: Tea Accessories
description:
We think brewing loose leaf tea should be made simple and easy, not fiddly and frustrating like some novelty tea-ball infusers, which are hard to fill and even harder to clean!  

So we have chosen these handy little accessories especially for their ease of use and stylish practical design, to make brewing your next cup of tea as enjoyable as possible.

* Our laser-cut, collapsible infuser works great in a mug and/or teapot, and is very easy to clean, as the leaves can be pushed out into the bin after use.  The collapsible design also means that it is easy to store in a cupboard/drawer (We are very sorry but this item is temporarily out of stock - will be back in the new year)  

* Our 100 TeaBrew filters do the same job as the mug infusers except they are disposable and non-bleached so they will not affect the flavour of your tea. 

* The 'perfect cup' teaspoon is great for measuring out your favourite teas in handy 1 cup portions.

* The Empress teacup strainer is the prettiest one we could find,  and rigorously tested not to rust over time. Made from stainless steel with a fine mesh to catch even the smallest bits of loose leaf tea.

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*

options.name: Pack of 100 Compostable tea brew filters

name: Round Stainless Steel Tea Pot
description:
This modern stainless steel round tea pot looks fab and comes with it's own re-moveable strainer for loose leaf tea! Holds up to 1.2itres of water & keeps the tea hot for ages.  It's also dishwasher safe and has a wonderful non-drip spout, essential for keeping your white table linen free from stains.

If you're looking to replace your current teapot... then this could be the one. Beautiful practical design

*FREE DELIVERY ON UK ORDERS OVER £35.00*
